title: What difference do Thai and Indonesian music have? - Quora

response.answer_text: if indonesian pop music, almost similar about the intsrument of the music with thai music. but the different is only language if u can understand these language. and the most different between them is traditional indonesian music, because the traditional indonesian music has a good taste and really different instrument, exactly java, sunda, papua and etc . all of them is traditional music in indonesian, u will definitely say it different when u listen it. perhaps it’s useful.

I think the difference is just about the language😀. Generally it's almost the same like Pop Song, Rock, Pop-rock, jazz, etc. Indonesia also has local/ethnic song/music which some of them also popular like Dangdut and other ethnical music in every regions.
